attributes.action: Introduce a compensation package for Restaurants, Pubs and Bars during covid19.
attributes.additional_details: Given that the three tier system in itself has adversely affected the hospitiality sector due to the restrictions in every teir including the most recent full lockdown in November. I believe that the Government should create a package of compensastion for Restaurants, Pubs and Bars to support them finanically, dependant upon their size and their previous takings, particularly independant venues that are run by the owners themselves, who have been offered no real support.
attributes.background: We would like the introduction of a compensation package for Restaurants, Pubs and Bars that have been adversely affected by both the lockdown causing closures, in addition to the three tier system that, in most cases, only permitted vistors from the same household to dine in.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. There are already financial support measures and grants available for businesses forced to close by Government restrictions. You can find more information here: https://www.gov.uk/business-coronavirus-support-finder
                
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, if you would like a specific package which is not already covered by Government action, we could accept a petition calling for this to happen.
